text: Correction and update of May 28, 2019: An earlier version of this fact check said that the image of the two men was manipulated on the basis of an expert forensic analysis. Since then, other forensic experts have objected to this determination, saying that the picture is correct. Since then, the French publisher AFP has published a story quoting men who appear in the picture. The men didn't object to the image. We can no longer support the claim that the picture has been manipulated, and we have deleted that proposal from this fact-checking exercise.
